recipesJson.name: Bryson's POG Ice Cream
recipesJson.author: QueerYourVape
recipesJson.description:
Today on SaturDIY'ing with fresh03 and Friends! We were doing Flavorah Frenzy! and aside from Flavorah being an amazing company with really good people, they also have great flavorings. I really enjoy their fruits, especially the tropical ones and with the nice weather coming out, I really wanted to make a smoothie/ice cream that's sweet, smooth, and vibrant in fruit and taste.

FLV Cream/FLV Vanilla Bean/FLV Sweet Coconut = a smooth, sweet, and moist ice cream.

FLV Guanabana/FLV Pink Guava/FLV Passion Fruit/FLV Blood Orange = yes, it's a POG ice cream, all Flavorah, deal with it.

I hope you enjoy this mix, and that everyone is doing well and staying safe.

Much love,
C. aka Queer Your Vape

[Photo credits = 16handles.com]
